markdownRemark.html:
If you run into an error:

*** Please tell me who you are.

Run

  git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
  git config --global user.name "Your Name"

to set your account's default identity.
Omit --global to set the identity only in this repository.

fatal: unable to auto-detect email address (got 'addania@addania-Lenovo-IdeaPad-Z510.(none)')

You can solve it with following steps:

1.git init
2.git config user.name "someone"
3.git config user.email "someone@someplace.com"
4.git add *
5.git commit -m "some init msg"

Reference: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11656761/git-please-tell-me-who-you-are-error
